website_summaries.verdict: Weighted to give a great feel for smooth shifting.
pros: Positive gear control even helps with sticky transmissions
Multiple adapters and easy to install
cons: Might stand a bit tall on some models
Leaves a gap on cars with reverse lockouts

customer_reviews.title: Weighted knob makes the difference
customer_reviews.text: My wrx came already came with a short throw shifter. While it felt so much better going through shorter gears, did not feel as confident when shifting. The extra weight makes it an entire difference. I'd highly recommend any weighted knob when installing a short throw. I chose this one for style, price, and weight. I'd recommend getting a blox racing adapter to complete the look which is located right under the knob. For comparison i believe stock knob is .3 lbs compared to this knob which is closer to 1lb.
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: Great Weighted Shift Knob!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered a few knobs before but they were just for aesthetics. They never had the weight to them, so shifting felt so awkward. I opted it to get a weighted one and hoped it would provide a better experience. The Mishimoto Weighted Shift Knob is really amazing! It provides a smooth shifting experience. Fits a Honda Civic 2007, but it is a bit high - It isn't a deal-breaker. Get's warm/hot during the day and cold during the night. Comes with three plastic adapters which I assume is for different vehicles. Overall - satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think the .8 lbs would be heavy enough but it's quite nice and the build quality is amazing. makes shifting in my scion tc much better. I had to use an adapter for it to fit in my 2005 scion tc and i wish the included thread adapters were made of metal. I cant tighten it enough without fear of breaking the plastic adapters. And it does loosen over time i wish there was a way to lock it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Gigabyte1024

customer_reviews.title: Super-B weighted shift knob!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I regret about this shifter is not buying it earlier! I drive a Miata NA and the Mishimoto shifter makes a HUGE difference on how shifting feels. The knob literally slides through gears, it's so smooth and effortless. The knob also looks really appealing, it has a clean darkened chrome look to it. The shift knob has great weight to it as well, could knock someone out! Even though this may seem obvious, but because it's a metal shiftknob..the knob does tend to get hot/cold depending on the temperature. You'll either be greeted by an icicle or satans fist! Love it, would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Yaser K

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: the weight and feel is amazing. Smooths everything rite out. I made a dumb mistake tho. I test fit this on my OEM shifter before I installed my short shifter to see if I would like it. I can't remove the universal adapter to install on short shifter. I could probably get it off if I chew it up with pliers but I want to maintain the threads. I wish they sold adapters separately. EDIT: After contacting Mishimoto through there website, I received a reply with an offer of new adapters for $10. Well worth the price in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: N8 - Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome weighted shifter
customer_reviews.text: This knob looks great in my car. Give a taller feel that I was wanting. It is heavy and has a great feel when shifting. The only thing I wish was different was the adapters that came with it are plastic. I wish they were metal to give a super tight feel. It really does look like a high end knob. Doesn’t look like it would scratch easily and the paint looks great on it. Super shiny. Gets a little warm in the sun but gets cool quick.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Quality - Ergonomic Comfort May Vary
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality. Mirror finish that appears to be clear coated for protection. Be careful with rings and jewelry. Nice heavy weight to it. If you are someone who likes to shift or ride with your hand/palm over the top of the knob, this might not be for you. This is a little uncomfortable for that style of shifting/driving because it's only about one inch in diameter. This is a "fingers around the bar and thumb on top" sort of shift knob. It is very cool, but not for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: ArcticMinibike

customer_reviews.title: Decent shifter nice weight
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my 2006 civic. Looks good and the weight helps make my shifts feel less clunky/plastic and more smooth. I ordered black but it's more of a dark grey so if you want black this isnt the one for you but I dont mind it. Also the adapters that come with it are plastic but work really well. It gets really cold in the winter time so I'm assuming it gets hot in the summer as well. It sits kinda high up on the shifter so I modified the adapter to allow it to screw down further which you can see in the last two pictures its lower.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley fogleman

customer_reviews.title: It’s so amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing knob. Goes great on an extension. The plastic inserts are great in theory but they strangely enough didn’t have the Nissan m10x1.25 threaded insert. So I had to source that elsewhere. But it’s probably my hands down favorite know to date and I’ve been burning money on cars for 15 years. And if you’re complaining about a hot or cold knob in your car, just go buy an automatic. We don’t wanna hear that noise. You should know metal gets hot and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Hot and cold, but good
customer_reviews.text: I really like the cylindrical shape of this shifter knob. It forces me to use my palm and all fingers, instead of just my thumb and two fingers. Thus, the shifting action feels more natural and proper. However, it is hot in the summer and cold in the winter, so buyers will need to wear a glove or use some sort of protective cover. The cover could be a piece of cloth or a bicycle hand grip.
customer_reviews.author: L. Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shifter! You will need to buy a boot collar
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shifter! I was surprised by the weight when I first pulled it out the box. The weight really changes the feel of shifting gears, it just falls in to place so smoothly. I ordered the black but it’s really more of a gunmetal, it has a really nice finish. If you do order this shifter you will need to buy a separate boot holder or you can use zipties to hold up the boot through the inside, that’s what i did.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Focus ST 2018
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2018 focus st. It fits good I really don’t like the spring being visible but for the price compared to others I can deal with it. It does sit higher then the stock shifter but I got used to it fast and honestly like it taller. Pair this with a short shifter plate from Cobb or something it’s perfect. The weight is perfect it’s about 10x more then stock and it feels better. The shifter does get hot but turn up that AC your good. Good product for price. The shifter comes with different threads use the biggest thread out of all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great either.
customer_reviews.text: The shift knob is more of a mirror-like/silver finish. It doesn’t look like carbon fiber at all, nor did I think they tried to make it look like it? Seriously I’ve seen way cheaper shift knobs that do a better job in replicating carbon fiber. 3/5 because it is weighted and makes shifting feel “tighter” and “smoother”. Feels good in hand, especially if you like a shifter that’s higher up to you.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Cute shift knob and works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a knob that is weighted and will make shifting smoother. Just something simple, nothing too flashy or expensive. I love this knob because it added a lil bit of height which I needed for more elbow room, and made my shifting a lot smoother! People say it gets hot, it does but if you use a sun visor and have your windows tinted, it won’t bother. 11/10 recommended, it gives my interior a lil pop!
customer_reviews.author: Kay aie

customer_reviews.title: Worth It Purchase for manual shifter
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black (it is more of a black chrome or really dark gunmetal, which looks better than black) shift knob to replace my worn out one on my Acura. The weight feels like a lot when you first pick up the shift knob, but after mounted in the car, it greatly improves the shift feel and throw. It is solid metal so it is prone to ambient temperature (cold in winter, hot in summer), just use a light glove or sunglasses case to cover it.
customer_reviews.author: Gutbuster

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and Feels Great.
customer_reviews.text: I came from using a ball style shift knob on my 350z. I didn't realize how tall it would sit on my shifter, but that's not really a big problem. This has a great feel. Heavy in the hands (like a weighted shift knob should be). Only major thing is, if you live in a state where it gets hot during the day, you are going to need a glove or something to drive. This thing gets hot!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Quite slim, Adaptors suck too. But sturdy enough and works for what i need.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a temporary knob in my MR2. I cant complain too much for 40$ but there are a few things you should be aware of. This thing is slim, it feels more like a hand brake handle than a knob. Secondly, the plastic adapters that come with it only allow you to screw it on like a inch not the full 2 inches, making it feel wonky/unstable counteracting the weighted concept. However, they are plastic, so you can easily tap the one you need if you have the tools. After that fix it works like a charm. If it was thicker and fit better, I'd probably keep it. But I'll be looking for a replacement soon.
customer_reviews.author: Bryceson

customer_reviews.title: The adapters
customer_reviews.text: The wight in the hand and the feel of it is nice, but since it's not threaded all the way through it will sit high on just about every shifter. You end up with that ugly gap between the boot and the knob itself. If you want to you can tap it out and make it work but at that point you should just buy an adapter or another knob that seats properly. I love everything about it but the adapters need to be changed.
customer_reviews.author: Truman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy for 40 bucks!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this shift knob about 1 or 2 days ago with free shipping, the shipping was extremely fast like a day early. I bought this for my Subaru wrx that barely wanted to shift after putting a short shifter on with a non weighted shift knob, this completely solved the problem like it added the perfect amount of leverage so it doesn’t feel like shifting a tractor trailer and it’s got a really nice feel and look to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little expensive, but 100% worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Seems expensive at first but truly a great product. 100% worth it. High quality for sure, weighted feel is great. I drive a 95 Dodge ram Cummins with the 5 speed manual behind it. It is easy to float gears normally but with this shifter knob it is seamless. The weight of the knob allows for much easier sliding in and out of synchros to change gear. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shift Knob, Weight Helped Cut Down Vibration
customer_reviews.text: This shift knob is amazing. I originally had second thoughts spending so much on a shift knob, but when I installed it I realized it was absolutely worth it. First of all, the knob itself if great looking and has a very distinctive weight. I have a short throw shifter installed on my car and the weight this knob added basically removed all the vibration that short shifters often have.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce N.

customer_reviews.title: Knees weak momas gonna need this knob.
customer_reviews.text: So my black shift knob came in with some defects but honestly they look okay so i just sent it. I love this. Perfect hight. Weight. Just sometimes with sweaty palms with moms spaghetti you might slip. But other than that. I love this shift knob.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but better options out there
customer_reviews.text: I am somewhat of a shift knob connoisseur as I have a collection of at least 50 of them. I bought this Mishimoto knob for my WRX to try it out. It's more a black chrome than just "gun metal" silver. 2 things i did not like was that it left a massive gap between knob and the Reverse lock which didn't make for a good look. Other thing was how tall it is, thing was almost up to my radio screen. Felt like i was shifting a mack truck. But for $40 its not a terrible option just wouldn't recommend for any cars with a shift or reverse lock.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Jones

customer_reviews.title: I suggest if you get this you know where it's going to be parked most of the time. It's solid metal
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in hand, not too heavy not too light. Any way you hold it is comfortable. However I have to drive with gloves on in the winter because my hand will freeze to it if I don't. Also summer time is always a gamble if you are going to burn your hand or not.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Dalby

customer_reviews.title: Fits on my Miata (M10x1.25 Thread)
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get it onto my shifter by buying an thread adapter (M10x1.25 to M12x1.25) for about 5$. Also side note is that the shifter is a tad bit smaller than expected
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Southern

customer_reviews.title: Fit 2001 Mustang GT amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. Nice weight. Adapter worked on my 01 mustang GT w/ Steeda tri ax short throw shifter. Feels a lot like a stick shape cause it’s not that wide so if you don’t like that feeling go for something wider than this. And it is tall which is good if you’re positioned far away from the shifter
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great shift knob!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my 95 miata. It gives shifting a good feel and even though it gets a bit hot if your car is sitting in the sun on a hot day, it cooled down pretty fast when i turned the AC on. Overall a great shift knob!
customer_reviews.author: Maddi

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the stock asymmetrical shift knob on my frontier. It would rotate under heavy shifting, which was annoying. This mishimoto shift knob is fantastic! It's weighted, stays in place, and is a quality part.
customer_reviews.author: board bender

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 2015 Civic Si
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation on a 2015 Civic SI. Bought it hoping it would improve gear shifts, and it's made a noticeable difference. I feel like the gears pop into gear more smoothly and I don't grind gears near as much as I did. So far, it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Prad Bitt

customer_reviews.title: Ordered black, received silver
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a black one to go with my plans for black interior, but was sent a silver one. Knocking it down to 4 stars for innacuracy of order, but I actually ended up liking the silver better. It looks and feels FANTASTIC for a much cheaper price than other weighted shifters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best knob for high performance driving
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a Voodoo Magnum shift knob, this one is far and above it. Feels great, looks even better in person, screws on easily, and simple to clean. During high-G turns and under heavy braking, I never lose grip of this thing, not even once. Does get pretty darn hot in 100 degree whether though.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Grijalva

customer_reviews.title: 00 Mustang GT
customer_reviews.text: Way better then the carbon ball one I had feels a lot better and shifts easier and very well made and has a good weight to it
customer_reviews.author: King Ranch 04

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: 2017 Tacoma for marlin crawler ... weighted shift knob reduced the gear noise transmission alot. Looks great ... very well made. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight, looks clean.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the honda fit. Nice size but wish it was a little bit bigger in diameter otherwise very pleased. The weight is perfect, definitely feel the difference when shifting. I paired it up with a boot adapter from Ebay.
customer_reviews.author: VITYA

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit focus st like they claim it does
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2016 focus st and it does come with the correct attachment, however there is nothing to hold the spring down to get it into reverse... they say it’s compatible but you have to buy a separate bolt to hold the spring down to get it to go in reverse.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Henke

customer_reviews.title: Weighted is the best
customer_reviews.text: The weight feels great with my short shifter. As expected it gets very hot to the touch in the summer, not a show stopper if you change gears and take your hand off the shifter. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY HUDGINS

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Very impressed and satisfied. Came out of the box perfect, fits on great. Just be careful twisting it on. Try to get it to the distance you want right away because twisting it off can leave the plastic insert behind. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Shifting never felt better!
customer_reviews.text: My shifting is now completely different. I have a 1991 Celica AllTrac, and this thing made a HUGE difference. Shifts are smooth and effortless. Well worth the extra money, and it's made to last. And, despite all the negative reviews, this thing is HEAVY. would recommend. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: I really like the weight and the feel....makes my car look fancy too. Although there is a gap between the shifter so trying to figure that out
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: Good Fits on FRS/ BRZ
customer_reviews.text: Good Fits on FRS/ BRZ, you might feel a little high shifting position, but I like it so far. Also, if you want to install it to FRS/BRZ, you need this part as well. It will help you to keep using the reverse gear with great look!! BLOX RACING BXAC-00242-XBK REVERSE LOCKOUT SHIFT KNOB ADAPTER 12X1.25MM
customer_reviews.author: Haden

customer_reviews.title: nice smooth shift
customer_reviews.text: Extremely tough to put on.(double checked to make sure I had the right adapter) Still wasnt able to make it cover all of the thread. Looks tacky with the metal showing at the bottom , Ill have to find something to cover it. Will be very hard to take off when I want it replaced. Only reason I didnt give it a one star is because its got the weight I wanted, nice smooth shift, and feels nice in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit 1990 NA Miata
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t fit on my 1990 NA Miata..... I saw other videos where some Mishimoto, like this one with the package. Comes with 3 extra adapters and one pre installed inside the knob, however when I opened it. I did see three extra ones, but no ore installed. I tried all three and none of them fit on my 90’ NA Miata... actually kinda tilting...
customer_reviews.author: FlowerBoy

customer_reviews.title: It Looks good..
customer_reviews.text: I liked it..it is such a breeze to install on my em1 with no mods at all & to my amazement it was like a plug n play part..I absolutely recommend this shift knob on manual cars but I'm still on learning mode cause of it being kinda heavy & slippery but overall I really liked it.👍💯
customer_reviews.author: Mark ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great shifter knob
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the cosmetic look of it but the actual functionality is great as well looking for more of this company product to fit on my car
customer_reviews.author: Darnell S.

customer_reviews.title: Good but came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is origional and pretty heavy, which helps switch gears alot easier. On the downside, the product came in scrached and looked used. The product came in with three different sized threads, and the one that fit my car just happened to be broken.
customer_reviews.author: Jose T.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Toyota Tundra 4WD truck. While the description claimed it fit my vehicle, it did not look good at all. The Tundra has a long shifter bar and this knob does not sit down far enough to make it look stock. This knob sticks up quite high and made my truck interior look ridiculous. I think this would be best for a small sports car. The knob felt and looked good by itself, just not in my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Watson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shift Knob
customer_reviews.text: This knob is just the right size. Not too long but makes it much easier to reach. The weight is perfect and helps a ton when going through the gears. It also looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: seany boi

customer_reviews.title: 75 Celica
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a 75 Celica with a W50 transmission. Used the M12 adapter that came with the shift knob. Works great and feels really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Ramsay

customer_reviews.title: This junt CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: My chick done got this junt fo me, i say it pretty coo, shifts alot smootha than my oem thang. Thread adapter aint particularly sturdy cuz its made if plastic but otha wise it be holdin up well, adds a lil bit a drip to the interior and all nahm sayinn
customer_reviews.author: Raymie cruz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, metal gets very hot though
customer_reviews.text: The weigheted shifter has a really nice feel, however keep in mind that it is all metal which I quickly realized was a problem in Phoenix in July. I would imagine the opposite effect if you're in a cold winter state it would be freezing, I almost burned my hand when I drove today when it was 114 degrees outside
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think just buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down one of the best shift knobs I’ve ever owned. Height and weight makes my car fall right into gear, definitely a huge improvement on shift times. High recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Grym

customer_reviews.title: Good, but difficult.
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice any has a good weight to it. My complaint is that the adapters are not threaded all the way through for a flush fit with boot, or at least cover the threads. It would also be nice if it was a bit thicker for people with larger hands. But 5 stars none the less, Worth the money so far.
customer_reviews.author: JP Oregel

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what it looksnlik like. Feels great, the only down side is winter cold with the metal. But I considered that before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Truly must buy it if you’re wanting to shift faster👌
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely stunning and has quite the weight❤️ It looks perfect in my FRS. Now, all I need is that adapter between my shift knob and reverse knob, and I’m set:)
customer_reviews.author: Mario Coldheart

customer_reviews.title: Solid,clean and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Honestly no complaints. I have this on my 03 350z and it feels great. I wanted something a little heavier than the stock shift knob. Stays clean. Feels great in your hand. In hot summers in CA, it does get hot but only for about 5 minutes until the AC gets on it. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: jcampa

customer_reviews.title: Looks, Feels, and Shifts Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shift knob. It really worked out nicely in my 2003 miata! Install was painless. Took the old shifter off. Found the right adapter and threaded it on to the shifter. Only one thing to be aware of its all metal it will get cold or hot in extreme temps but Im ok with that and knew it would do that going in. Looks, Feels, and Shifts Great!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mengus

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks good....I don't think it's much heavier than the stock knob...one thing I'd add....before installing put a light coating of oil on the threads...to say this fits tight would be an understatement.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: mishimoto weighted shift knob
customer_reviews.text: Feels great and the weight allows you to feel the shift
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Way better than stock
customer_reviews.text: Shifts way better now. Sits about 2" higher, heavy weight makes shifting my 2008 toyota tacoma 4x4 5 speed much easier and smoother. Looks really kick ass too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Zwick

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is really nice. The weighted knob makes it that much easier to shift. Stylish chrome look. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent under-budget mod!
customer_reviews.text: Great mod for folks who are under budget. Offers an excellent weight ratio for my WRX 2017. Would also recommend purchasing the Blox Racing Adapter for a cleaner look.
customer_reviews.author: dx

customer_reviews.title: Gap between shift boot and shift knob.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is heavy and sits kind of high, makes for easy shifting. The bad thing though is that it does not screw down far enough to cover the threads and shifter. So there is about a 2 to 3 inch gap between the shift boot and the bottom of the shift knob. I don’t mind it though. I like how it shifts and I’m probably gonna use it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: rida

customer_reviews.title: smooth shifting
customer_reviews.text: it’s a great shift knob feels way better than an oem shift knob feel more smooth the only downfall is after a day of sitting it gets so hot so just a warning
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Can Am x3 shift lever
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my Can am X3! Anyone who has been in a X3 knows the oem shift knob is hard to get your hand around out of park, and is just cheap for such a pricey machine. Came with the proper thread adapter needed. Much more positive engagement/leverage than stock. Also added some clearance for my radio/bluetooth controller. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Good solid feeling shift knob
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the shift knob in my 2013 Honda Fit that my dog chewed off. Works nice, has a solid feel to it
customer_reviews.author: Matt P

customer_reviews.title: Great product, came scratched.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice addition to my 2018 Civic Si but the leather boot falls down and won’t successfully snap into place. Also, was delivered with a scratch right on the top by the M emblem. Guess I got a crappy one of the bunch.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable knob if you like this shape. Installed on my 2010 civic and thanks to the weight made shifting feel more solid. Be careful parking in the sun, the knob is metal and can get pretty hot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Shift knob is nice and it has good weight to it. The only downside is the adapters don't have treading all the way through.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good but no compatible adapter
customer_reviews.text: The product is well made and is good quality, but the M10 adapter doesn't even come in the correct pitch for my shifter. Since the adapters are plastic, it cross threaded just about instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on good reviews, I was really looking forward to getting it on my car and it came with no adapters like the description clearly explains. Very disappointed. The shifter itself is sweet, but come on man what's the point of I can't put it on my car and enjoy it without having to buy more stuff?
customer_reviews.author: arielle

customer_reviews.title: Better shifting experience
customer_reviews.text: IMO 5 star. Shipped out quick. Product was amazing. Just installed and was a little had to get on but not enough to take a star away becuse it made a huge improvement in shifting. Have it installed on my 06 350z and boy oh boy is driving so much more enjoyable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J.

customer_reviews.title: Best shift knob i've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Weight of it feels fantastic, ergonomics are great, extends height juuust a little bit, and it makes shifting consistently easier in every car I've used it in. Only downside is it gets freezing cold in the winter, and scorching hot in the summer, but it's a small sacrifice.
customer_reviews.author: stomish

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for decent price
customer_reviews.text: I was getting annoyed by my OEM shifter in my 2016 Civic because the plastic top that shows the 6-speed and reverse kept popping off. I found this shift knob, and I must say that it's very sleek in design and comfortable to hold. I would recommend this over most OEM shifters today.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shift knob I love it would recommend
customer_reviews.text: It's one of the more expensive knobs on Amazon but it's definitely worth the price automatic or manual this will give you a nice new look to your car and the weight is great great material on thing I would suggest is becareful screwing on the adapters .. it's good plastic but could wear over time if constant twisting on and off
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Michael Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Simple and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice weight and feel to it. It will definitely be my go to knob for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Hott Cheese

customer_reviews.title: Great shifter
customer_reviews.text: Great weighted shift knob. My only complaint is it isn't recessed and sits taller on my 6 speed shifter.
customer_reviews.author: ArrCar

customer_reviews.title: Good weight and feel
customer_reviews.text: I love this on my 07 Miata! It just makes the shifts so much smoother. Only issue is it is metal and will get hot in the summer so make sure to cover it or put a sunshade to keep it from getting heated in the sun. Otherwise worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Saleem

customer_reviews.title: Adapters suck!
customer_reviews.text: Shift knob looks and feels great, but the thread adapters that come with it get stuck on the shift lever when you remove the shift knob. I've been having to use players to take the adapter off. I'll be ordering a different shift knob in the very near future
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just wish it was a bit wider and taller, I have a short shifter and big hands so it’s a little farther down than I’d like but it’s a great product
customer_reviews.author: Michael Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel and weight of this shifter
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel and weight of this shifter. Only down sides are when it's hot, it will get hot and the black version kind of looks silver, but those are just cosmetics.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: fit 2014 nissan juke
customer_reviews.text: Used this shift knob with a shifter extension from torque solution used for a 2014 nissan juke nismo and fit perfectly got the black and love the color it was in perfect condition and packaging
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: for non reverse-lockout imo
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight of it and it’s kind of worth it but what I dislike Was the distance with the reverse lockout. If anyone is buying this, make sure you don’t have a reverse lockout like the STIs. I have a 2006 Subaru Sti. Buy it for a non-reverse lockout .
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price - high quality shift knob.
customer_reviews.text: Super heavy and high quality. The form factor and ergonomics are on point - it makes shifting a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little weighted shift know
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, has a great weight to it. It feels really nice. I really have no complains about it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Chipping
customer_reviews.text: My shifting is much smoother however after about 6 months the paint is beginning to wear. Overall good product shoulda got chrome though.
customer_reviews.author: Logan G.

customer_reviews.title: 2005 Subaru Legacy GT must have for
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and heavy. Big upgrade this is a must-have. Comes with adapters making the fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kicin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice shift knob
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice shift knob. I did however have to retap one of the adapters to fit Miata shift knob thread which i believe is an m10x1.25. the adapters that come with did not have that thread pitch. But after 5mins i solved that problem with a tap.
customer_reviews.author: Slowyata

customer_reviews.title: Nicest knob I've seen
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is beyond what I was inspecting. From the packaging it came in to the knob itself, it is worth every penny. It comes with three threaded nylon adapters of different sizes that should fit most cars with a stick. The knob is very heavy which is awesome, and the black chrome finish is beautiful. It extends the shift knob quite a bit. Doesn't make your shifter a short throw obviously since the actually distance of each gear change hasn't changed, but it does provide you a great deal more leverage. For the price, you can't beat this knob.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Great shifter, but a little small
customer_reviews.text: I love the weight and styling of this shift knob. For me the only drawback is the size, I have big hands and the shifter feels tiny, it would be better if it had a larger diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Nick C

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase Used!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item used because how banged up could a returned shift knob actually be. The shift knob its-self was great but the adapter from the previous owner used was stuck and I was unable to get it out to use the adapter I needed for my car. So just buy new it so you dont have to go through the return process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: At first I found this knob to be quite thin but it's grown on me and I've since adapted to it. It looks really nice in the dark chrome finish and completes the look of my shifter. Only downside is on hot days, it gets terribly hot. Park in the shade!
customer_reviews.author: Matt D

customer_reviews.title: Great weight and shifting throws.
customer_reviews.text: Great weight, rounded shape makes it easy so shift up or down easily. Weight makes the throws feel really great.
customer_reviews.author: Tekka

customer_reviews.title: Silver
customer_reviews.text: Silver as the photo shows. Has a great weight and provides a good grip for shifting gears. Highly recommend, plus it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Kurizeru Dono

customer_reviews.title: the packaging is very poor, and the product was not at all as ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit. had to return. the packaging is very poor, and the product was not at all as large as i had expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit E46
customer_reviews.text: Just FYI. It does not fit my 2004 BMW 330ci. Had to custom mount it.
customer_reviews.author: Kana'i Durant

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Doesn't fit my car
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Doesn't fit my car, even w/ adapters, would have returned if not for all the holiday hub ub. Look for this at one of my garage sales and maybe it'll cover a 6 pack in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but I've only had it for fall ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but I've only had it for fall and winter. With California weather, I did notice a slight heat change in the knob, which could increase as the weather gets even hotter. Besides this though, it's a better feel than the stock shift knob. I just wish they made one without the "M".
customer_reviews.author: TTW

customer_reviews.title: Happy knob!
customer_reviews.text: My knob looks and feels amazing. 05 impreza outback sport.
customer_reviews.author: Roach

customer_reviews.title: Makes shifting smooth
customer_reviews.text: Great knob. Really makes a difference in shifting. I have a rx8 and the stock knob made the shifts very rough. Fits perfectly and don’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: adapter broke!
customer_reviews.text: adapter is threaded i can no longer lock it after only having 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Justina Okorocha

product_meta.title: Mishimoto Weighted Shift Knob Silver (MMSK-SL)
product_meta.description: Color:SilverThe Mishimoto Shift Knob provides a superior alternative to your factory shift knob.The weighted shift knob allows for smoother, faster shifting while the signature "M" logo and polished black or silver finish adds some Mishimoto flare to your interior.Includes three M18 X 1.5 plastic inserts for multiple application fitment.
feature_bullets: Weighted knob allows for easier shifts
Application fitments: M8 x 1.25, M10 x 1.5, M12 x 1.25
